Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.services

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
com.vagsoft.bookstore.services.BookService
@Service public class BookService extends Object
Service class for book operations.

  • Method Details

    • getBooks

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<BookReadDTO> getBooks(String title, String genre, String author, String description, Double minPrice, Double maxPrice, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a list of books filtered by the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the books to search for (optional)
      genre - the genre of the books to search for (optional)
      author - the author of the books to search for (optional)
      description - the description of the books to search for (optional)
      minPrice - the minimum price of the books to search for (optional)
      maxPrice - the maximum price of the books to search for (optional)
      pageable - the pagination information (optional)
      Returns:
      a page of books

    • addBook

      Adds a new book.
      Parameters:
      bookWriteDTO - the book to be added
      Returns:
      the added book

    • getBookByID

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public BookReadDTO getBookByID(Integer bookID)
      Retrieves a book by its ID.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the retrieved book

    • updateBookByID

      @Transactional public Optional<BookReadDTO> updateBookByID(Integer bookID, BookUpdateDTO bookUpdateDTO)
      Updates a book by its ID with the given book information.
      Parameters:
      bookID - the ID of the book to be updated
      bookUpdateDTO - the new book information
      Returns:
      the updated book

    • deleteBookByID

      Deletes a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookID - the ID of the book to be deleted

    • requestBooks

      @Transactional public void requestBooks(Integer bookID, Integer quantity)
      Checks if a book has enough stock and deletes the requested quantity from the stock.
      Parameters:
      bookID - the ID of the book to check
      quantity - the quantity of the book

    • returnBooks

      @Transactional public void returnBooks(Integer bookID, Integer quantity)
      Returns books to the stock by increasing the availability of the book.
      Parameters:
      bookID - the ID of the book to return
      quantity - the quantity of the book to return
